interpretation.answer: Sagittal CT and sagittal+axial T2-weighted MRI of the lumbar spine, demonstrate a burst fracture of L2 with retropulsion of bony fragments into the spinal canal. The posterior ligamentous complex, appears grossly intact.

classification.answer: TLICS- 2 pts for burst (final score dependent on neuro exam).

management.answer: Posterior decompression and instrumented fusion. Could also be argument for non-op.

extra.title: Thoracolumbar Injury Classification and Severity Scale (TLICS)
